recipesJson.name: Peanut Butter Custard Milkshake
recipesJson.author: SteamOn
recipesJson.description:
A bold and smooth Peanut Butter Milkshake profile. Nutty, Creamy, Thick! Koolada and Saline are optional.

Video for flavor notes: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M67_89eFmyE

reviews.text: Loved this. Its great. Very thick, creamy vape. Great PB taste. Custard and creams are balanced. You can taste the thick shake. Great job!

I have been craving peanut butter so, upon recommendation from someone else, I decided to mix this up and boy am I glad I did. This is really a delicious recipe. I left out the saline solution since I didn't have any but it is still so very tasty. Very well balanced with the creams and milkshake components with the peanut butter. Nice work sir!
